content: <situation name="jf4c62434b688dadd0d50b6723871567" mapAllAttributes="Y">      <class name="Disk_Used_Perc" />      <slot slotName="msg">        <literalString value="ALERT - Disk Space Percent (%) Used on $KLZ_Disk.Mount_Point$ - Actual = $KLZ_Disk.Disk_Used_Percent$ - Threshold = 95 - Disk_Used_Perc - Fatal" />      </slot>      <slot slotName="probe">        <literalString value="Disk Space Percent (%) Used on /" />      </slot>      <slot slotName="threshold">        <literalString value="95" />      </slot>      <slot slotName="profile">        <literalString value="gti_rhp_base" />      </slot>    </situation>
